statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_trading_data
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, trade_price FROM cryptocurrency_trading_data WHERE trade_volume > 1000
SELECT trade_id, trade_timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_trading_data ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, trade_volume, trade_price FROM cryptocurrency_trading_data WHERE trade_volume > 500 ORDER BY trade_price ASC
SELECT MAX(trade_price) AS max_price, MIN(trade_price) AS min_price FROM cryptocurrency_trading_data
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_trading_data WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, trade_volume FROM cryptocurrency_trading_data WHERE trade_id % 2 = 0 AND trade_price < 50 ORDER BY trade_volume ASC
SELECT trade_id, trade_timestamp, trade_price FROM cryptocurrency_trading_data WHERE trade_volume > 1000 AND cryptocurrency_name LIKE 'Bitcoin%' ORDER BY trade_timestamp ASC
SELECT trade_volume, trade_price FROM cryptocurrency_trading_data WHERE trade_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY trade_volume DESC, trade_price ASC
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, COUNT(trade_id) AS trade_count FROM cryptocurrency_trading_data GROUP BY cryptocurrency_name HAVING trade_count > 5 ORDER BY trade_count DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_exchange;
SELECT exchange_name, exchange_location FROM cryptocurrency_exchange;
SELECT trade_price, trade_volume, trade_timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_trade;
SELECT coin_name, trade_price FROM cryptocurrency_trade;
SELECT exchange_location, exchange_name FROM cryptocurrency_exchange;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_exchange WHERE exchange_location = 'USA' ORDER BY exchange_name ASC
SELECT exchange_id, exchange_name FROM cryptocurrency_exchange WHERE exchange_name LIKE '%exchange%'
SELECT coin_name, trade_price, trade_volume FROM cryptocurrency_trade WHERE trade_volume > 100 ORDER BY trade_price DESC
SELECT trade_id, coin_name, trade_timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_trade WHERE trade_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_exchange INNER JOIN cryptocurrency_trade ON cryptocurrency_exchange.exchange_id = cryptocurrency_trade.trade_id
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_data;
SELECT symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT exchange_name, base_currency, quote_currency FROM exchange_data ORDER BY exchange_name DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_data WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, symbol, price, volume FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT id, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE price < 50 AND volume > 1000 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM exchange_data WHERE base_currency = 'BTC' AND quote_currency = 'USD' ORDER BY fees ASC;
SELECT id, exchange_name, fees FROM exchange_data WHERE fees >= 0.1 ORDER BY exchange_name DESC;
SELECT id, username, registration_date FROM user_data WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency;
SELECT name, symbol FROM cryptocurrency WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, price, volume FROM market_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_records WHERE trade_type = 'buy' AND amount > 100;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 10;
SELECT id, name, symbol FROM cryptocurrency WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT currency_id, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM market_data GROUP BY currency_id HAVING AVG(price) > 1000;

SELECT trading_records.timestamp, trading_records.amount, cryptocurrency.name FROM trading_records JOIN market_data ON trading_records.market_data_id = market_data.id JOIN cryptocurrency ON market_data.currency_id = cryptocurrency.id WHERE trading_records.trade_type = 'buy';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (SELECT currency_id FROM market_data WHERE price > 500);
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT id, name, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM exchanges WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT id, name, website FROM exchanges ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, location, website FROM exchanges WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT trades.id, cryptocurrencies.name, exchanges.name AS exchange_name, timestamp, amount, price FROM trades JOIN cryptocurrencies ON trades.cryptocurrency_id = cryptocurrencies.id JOIN exchanges ON trades.exchange_id = exchanges.id ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.id, username, email, a.analytics_data->>'profit_percentage' AS profit_percentage FROM users u JOIN trades t ON u.id = t.id JOIN analytics a ON t.id = a.trade_id WHERE a.analytics_data->>'profit_percentage' > '10';

SELECT t.id, cryptocurrencies.name AS cryptocurrency, exchanges.name AS exchange, timestamp, amount, price FROM trades t JOIN cryptocurrencies ON t.cryptocurrency_id = cryptocurrencies.id JOIN exchanges ON t.exchange_id = exchanges.id WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
